string-array.name: snark_array
string-array.item: Right this way, sir!
Brah! Grab a brewsky!
Bitches get stitches!
Oh my gawd. Did you SEE her shoes?
Psst. You\'ve got a little thing… hanging from your nose… ya need a Kleenex?
All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy. All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy.
I\'m taking you to the station. Where is it?
When I\'m a walkin\' I strut my stuff… La, la, la... Now it\'s stuck in your head, isn\'t it? :)
English, motherfucker, do you speak it?
It could probably get worse than this. Wait - it can always get worse. Shit.
I don\'t hate people. I just like it better when they\'re not around.
Always be yourself. Unless you suck.
Give a man a match and he\'ll be warm for a minute. Set him on fire and he\'ll be warm for the rest of his life.
Everyone is entitled to be stupid, but some abuse the privilege.
No, those pants don\'t make your butt look big. Your butt makes your butt look big.
My parents taught me to be kind, humble, and honest; and to save a metric fuckton of plastic bags under the sink.
I wish I had a Voodoo doll of myself so I could give it a back rub.
Wait, wait… I had something for this…. Ummm... nope. Lost it.
You keep using that word, I do not think it means what you think it means.
That boy is dumber than a box of rocks.
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer...
Oh, my, God, Becky, look at her butt. It is so big, she looks like one of those rap guys\' girlfriends.
Dermatologists Hate Her! She is 51 - looks 25. Click her to learn the truth now!
Leeeeeeroy Jennnnnnnkins!
All your tables are belong to us.
